overview: A teenage boy with a psychological disorder is being sleep paralysed at a particular time period with a DEMON on the other side waiting to choke him dead. And on the other hand he is  struck in a TIME-LOOP on the same day again and again.  Will he be able to over come his complexity?
tagline: TIME WAITS FOR NONE, WHAT IF IT DOES?
title: The Happening: Scuffle
